economics.name: All Fives
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 5-cost champions.

economics.name: Enhance
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with champions 1 cost higher.

economics.name: Sinister Shop
economics.desc: Gain 6 Shop rerolls. This Charm costs 4 player health.

economics.name: Dehance
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with champions 1 cost lower.

economics.name: All Ones
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 1-cost champions.

economics.name: Coin Flip
economics.desc: 50% chance to gain 1 gold for each Coin Flip you\'ve used.

economics.name: Minor Gambit
economics.desc: If you win your next player combat, gain 3 gold.

economics.name: All Fours
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 4-cost champions.

economics.name: The Count
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with a 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 cost champion.

economics.name: Major Gambit
economics.desc: If you win your next player combat, gain 10 gold.

economics.name: Life Insurance
economics.desc: Next combat: Allied champions have a 50.0% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

economics.name: Animate Shop
economics.desc: For 20 seconds, your shop refreshes for free every 2 seconds.

economics.name: Discount
economics.desc: This round, the next champion you buy is free.

economics.name: All Twos
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 2-cost champions.

economics.name: All Threes
economics.desc: Reroll your Shop with all 3-cost champions.

economics.name: Sinister Deal
economics.desc: Gain 2 gold. This Charm costs 1 player health.

economics.name: Truce
economics.desc: You and your opponent gain 1 gold.

economics.name: Die Roll
economics.desc: Roll a die. Gain gold equal to the result.

combat.name: Summon Voidling
combat.desc: Gain a Voidling for 1 round.

combat.name: Assassin
combat.desc: Next combat: Your highest AD champion jumps to the enemy backline.

combat.name: Treasure Hunter
combat.desc: 1 champion without items gain an Unstable Treasure Chest for 1 round.

combat.name: Aftershock
combat.desc: Next Combat: After 10 seconds, stun all enemies for 1.5 seconds.

combat.name: Phantom Gloves
combat.desc: Gain a temporary Thief\'s Gloves for 1 round.

combat.name: Surprise!
combat.desc: 1 champion without items gains a Suspicious Trenchcoat for 1 round.

combat.name: Bunch-o\'-Belts
combat.desc: Your team gains 6 non-removable Giant\'s Belts for 1 round.

combat.name: Lucky Find
combat.desc: Gain 1 gold. Your team gains 50 Health for 1 round.

combat.name: Moonlight Ritual
combat.desc: Next combat: A random 1 or 2 cost champion stars up.

combat.name: Golden Dummy
combat.desc: Gain a Dummy for 1 round. Your Dummies drop gold as they take damage.

combat.name: Dress Down
combat.desc: Next combat: 30% Shred and Sunder all enemies for 8 seconds.

combat.name: Spawn Swarm
combat.desc: Next combat: Your 1st 2 front row units spawn a voidling after death.

combat.name: Backrow Star
combat.desc: Next combat: A random back row champion gains 40.0% AS for 7 seconds.

combat.name: Radiantize
combat.desc: 1 full item held by a champion becomes Radiant for 1 round.

combat.name: Big Surprise!
combat.desc: 2 champions without items gain a Suspicious Trenchcoat for 1 round.

combat.name: Treasure Party
combat.desc: 1 champions without items gain 2 Unstable Treasure Chests for 1 round.

combat.name: Summon Dragon
combat.desc: Summon a 3200 Health Dragon for 1 round.

combat.name: Animate Bench
combat.desc: Next combat: Every 6 seconds, a champion joins combat from your bench.

combat.name: Tremors
combat.desc: Combat start and every 10 seconds, stun all enemies for 1.25 seconds.

combat.name: Barrier
combat.desc: Next combat: Your team gains 1000 Shield, decaying over 5 seconds.

combat.name: Guild of Thieves
combat.desc: Gain 3 temporary Thief\'s Gloves for 1 round.

combat.name: Meteor Storm
combat.desc: Combat start: Burn and deal 30.0% max Health magic damage to 4 enemies.

combat.name: Infliction
combat.desc: Next combat: Chill, Burn, Shred, and Sunder enemies for 8 seconds.

combat.name: Summon Golem
combat.desc: Summon a large Golem equipped with defensive items for 1 round.

combat.name: Summon Dummy
combat.desc: Gain a Target Dummy for 1 round.

combat.name: Shivinate
combat.desc: All your items transform into Statikk Shiv for 1 round.

combat.name: Earthquake
combat.desc: Next combat: Stun all enemies for 2 seconds.

combat.name: Lightning Strike
combat.desc: Next combat: Deal 10% max Health as true damage to all enemies.

combat.name: Summon Dummies
combat.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies for 1 round.

combat.name: Phantom Claw
combat.desc: Gain 1 temporary Dragon\'s Claw for 1 round.

combat.name: Silver Guard
combat.desc: Next combat start: Your team is immune to crowd control for 8 seconds.

combat.name: Phantom Emblem
combat.desc: Gain a temporary emblem of your most active trait for 1 round.

combat.name: Sunfire Sorcery
combat.desc: Next combat: Burn and Wound enemies for 10 seconds.

combat.name: Phantom Vest
combat.desc: Gain a temporary Bramble Vest for 1 round.

combat.name: Yordle Spirit
combat.desc: Next combat: Your team has a 99% chance to dodge attacks for 4 seconds.

combat.name: Phantom Artifact
combat.desc: Gain a temporary Artifact for 1 round.

combat.name: Ironclad Spirit
combat.desc: Your team gains 30 Armor for 1 round.

combat.name: Mystic Spirit
combat.desc: Your team gains 30 Magic Resist for 1 round.

combat.name: Scrappy
combat.desc: 2 champions without items gain a temporary full item.

combat.name: Paragon
combat.desc: Next combat: Your team\'s physical damage is dealt as magic damage

combat.name: Counterspell
combat.desc: Next combat: Mana Reave all enemies.

combat.name: Reaper
combat.desc: Next combat: Your units execute enemies that fall below 200 Health.

combat.name: Golden Armor
combat.desc: Your team gains 50 HP for every 10 gold you have for 1 round.

combat.name: Scope Expansion
combat.desc: Champions in your back 2 rows gain 2 Attack Range for 1 round.

combat.name: Rite of Speed
combat.desc: Your team gains 10.0% Attack Speed for 1 round.

combat.name: Ultra Ascension
combat.desc: Next combat: At 22 seconds, your team gains 300% Damage Amp.

combat.name: Zoomify
combat.desc: Your team gains 200% movement speed for 1 round.

combat.name: Hugify
combat.desc: Your highest HP champion grows, gaining 500 HP for 1 round.

combat.name: Hexplosion
combat.desc: Next combat: The first ally champion to die explodes, dealing 600 magic damage.

combat.name: Starless Shield
combat.desc: Next combat: Grant 300 Shield to your 1-star champions.

random.name: Conjure Anvil
random.desc: Gain a component anvil.

random.name: Minor Mimicry
random.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

random.name: Assembly
random.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

random.name: Combat Mastery
random.desc: Next combat: Gain 1 XP for each enemy your team kills.

random.name: Major Mimicry
random.desc: Gain a Champion Duplicator.

random.name: Conjure Artifact
random.desc: Gain an Artifact anvil.

random.name: Major Polymorph
random.desc: Non-combat: A 4-cost champ you have transforms into a 5-cost.

random.name: Late Bloomer
random.desc: Gain a permanent 3-star 1-cost champion and a Magnetic Remover.

random.name: Magnum Opus
random.desc: Lose 66 player health. Gain a permanent 3-star 5-cost.

random.name: Conjure Support
random.desc: Gain a Support Anvil

random.name: Tinker
random.desc: Gain a Reforger and a Remover.

random.name: Minor Wish
random.desc: Gain a random minor effect.

random.name: Crystal Ball
random.desc: Reveal who your next opponent is.

random.name: Minor Polymorph
random.desc: Non-combat: A 1-cost champ you have transforms into a 2-cost.

random.name: Copycat
random.desc: Next combat: Get a 1-star copy of the first enemy champion to die.

random.name: Magic Mirror
random.desc: Gain a 1-star copy of a random champion you fielded last combat.

random.name: Salvager
random.desc: Any champions you bench this turn have items removed and broken apart.

random.name: Leadership
random.desc: A champion holding 3 completed items gains 300 Health permanently.

random.name: Sticky Fingers
random.desc: Next combat: copy a component from the 1st enemy your team kills.

random.name: Major Wish
random.desc: Gain a random effect.

random.name: Conjure Emblem
random.desc: Gain a random Emblem.

random.name: Polymorph
random.desc: Non-combat: A 2-cost champ you have transforms into a 3-cost.

random.name: Comfort Food
random.desc: Gain 1 player health. Gain 2 more if you lose next player combat.

random.name: Study Hard
random.desc: Gain 2 XP for each Study Hard you\'ve bought this game.

traits.name: Piece of Cake
traits.desc: Gain 25 sugar for your Sugarcraft cake.

traits.name: Eldritch Hunger
traits.desc: Next combat: Your Eldritch God gains 20.0% AS and 10.0% HP on takedown.

traits.name: Hocus Pocus
traits.desc: Next combat: Witches gain 25 Ability Power.

traits.name: Busy Bees
traits.desc: Your Bees gain 25.0% Attack Speed this round.

traits.name: Queen\'s Gambit
traits.desc: Next combat: If you win, gain a copy of your highest cost Faerie.

traits.name: Spitfire
traits.desc: Next combat: Dragon attacks deal an extra 1.0% max Health true damage.

traits.name: Quickening
traits.desc: Next combat: Chrono champions gain +30% AS after countdown.

traits.name: Frosty Fortitude
traits.desc: Next combat: Winter ice soldiers gain 40.0% more Health.

traits.name: Supreme Arcana
traits.desc: Your High Arcana champion gains 20.0% Damage Amp and Durability for 1 round.

Xerath.name: The Sun
Xerath.desc: Gain a Support anvil and an Artifact anvil.

Xerath.name: The Emperor
Xerath.desc: Next combat: Xerath gains 20.0% Damage Amp and his allies gain 10.0% Damage Amp.

Xerath.name: Judgement
Xerath.desc: Next combat: If you win, gain 12 gold; if you lose, gain 20 XP.

Xerath.name: The Star
Xerath.desc: Next combat: 1-stars star up. Their allies gain 200 Shield and 20 AP.

Xerath.name: The Tower
Xerath.desc: Gain a Lightning Dummy for 1 round that strikes nearby enemies.

Xerath.name: The World
Xerath.desc: Gain a copy of every 4-cost champion.

Xerath.name: The Lovers
Xerath.desc: Gain a 5-cost champion and a 2* 2-cost champion that share traits.

Xerath.name: The Chariot
Xerath.desc: This round, rerolls cost you 1 gold and buying XP costs you 3 gold.
